name: a_void
description:
Hyperspace is a dangerous place and it's your job to pilot the ship through it. Unfortunately, most of the systems got fried, including visual sensors.

You have to use scanner's audio channel to identify the dangers. 

This is a short concept for audio-based game. It takes 5–10 minutes to finish. But it may be pretty challenging.

There are energy-things that adds energy to your batteries. They make chaotic-noise, steer left or right (A/D) to get in front of them as they pass by so you can catch them. 

There are also hostile things that damage and eventually destroy your ship. You can make 180 degrees scan by pressing left alt, and to shoot them down hold RMB, aim, and them press LMB. Notice, that most of the actions need energy, don't let it drain or you'll be defenseless. 

Headphones are necessary, or at least a pair of stereo speakers

Creator of the terminal 3d model: silaspaige1998.
